extension.name: NortheBridge by Design Repository for Kodi

extension.summary: The NortheBridge by Design Repository for Kodi featuring addons such as Arctic Zephyr: From Ashes Danvers and Arctic Zephyr: For Another Age.
extension.description: Containing the Arctic Zephyr: For Another Age skin and Arctic Zephyr: From Ashes skin for Kodi as well as required and suggested addons to enhance the AZ:FA experience, the NortheBridge by Design Repository is an exclusive and carefully curated repository intended for use with From Ashes Project releases.
extension.disclaimer: For Kodi 17 Krypton or later. Maintained by NortheBridge Enterprises, LLC.
